As a charity organization, we are hosting a marathon to raise funds for a noble cause. To ensure fair play and safety for all participants, we need to formulate a set of rules for the marathon. 
Can you help us create an [HTML page] containing the rules for participating in the charity marathon? It should include information such as registration details, eligibility criteria, dress code, prohibited items, medical requirements, and any other relevant details. Additionally, we would like to include a [JavaScript code] that calculates the time taken by each participant to complete the marathon and displays it on the webpage. Can you help us with the code as well?
